132.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning (1985)
132.movie_plot: The making of Friday the 13th: A New Beginning (1985) with interviews with the cast and crew.

155.movie_plot: While Andy's mother is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, the young boy is placed in foster care, and Chucky, determined to claim Andy's soul, is not far behind.

147.movie_plot: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

140.movie_plot: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

168.movie_plot: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

151.movie_plot: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

170.movie_plot: After his friend is killed by her abusive father, the new kid in town attempts to save her by implanting robotic microchips into her brain.

165.movie_plot: Behind a young family's home in Maine is a terrible secret that holds the power of life after death. When tragedy strikes, the threat of that power soon becomes undeniable.

167.movie_plot: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

153.movie_plot: Kong falls from the twin towers and he appears to be alive. However, his heart is failing, so it's replaced with an artificial one. All is well until he senses that there's a female Kong somewhere out there and escapes wreaking havoc.

137.movie_plot: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

139.movie_plot: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

128.movie_name: Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master, A (1988)

135.movie_plot: A boatful of graduating high school students headed to Manhattan accidentally pull Jason Voorhees along for the ride.

134.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood (1988)
134.movie_plot: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the dormant Jason Voorhees returns to the camp grounds when he is accidentally released from his prison by a telekinetic teenager.

169.movie_plot: Nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's Day weekend.

156.movie_plot: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him and who has since become a teenager.

150.movie_plot: Hatch Harrison had a traffic accident with his car. At first the doctors said he was dead but then they succeeded to bring him back to life after two hours. But Hatch starts to have strange...

158.movie_plot: The Candyman arrives in New Orleans and sets his sights on a young woman whose family was ruined by the immortal killer years before.

154.movie_name: Hello Mary Lou: Prom Night II (1987)

148.movie_plot: A tale of the mysterious, but necessary, mating ritual between men and women of today and everything they think about sex but are afraid to say.

161.movie_plot: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

79.movie_name: I Know What You Did Last Summer (1997)

2.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

53.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

125.movie_plot: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time and now the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

18.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

34.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
34.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

122.movie_name: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995)
122.movie_plot: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

44.movie_plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

114.movie_plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

113.movie_plot: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

124.movie_name: Return of the Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The (1994)
124.movie_plot: This 55 minute documentary includes on-set footage and interviews with the cast and crew. It is a fascinating behind-the-scenes look at the film that went on to become the black sheep of the Texas Chainsaw franchise.

61.movie_plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

72.movie_plot: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

52.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

14.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

11.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

110.movie_plot: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

99.movie_name: Final Conflict, The (a.k.a. Omen III: The Final Conflict) (1981)
99.movie_plot: The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.

23.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

75.movie_plot: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

76.movie_plot: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

101.movie_plot: Two years after the first series of murders, a new psychopath dons the Ghostface costume and a new string of killings begins.

30.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

120.movie_name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988)

88.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

68.movie_plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

37.movie_plot: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

74.movie_plot: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

121.movie_name: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers (1989)

71.movie_plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

100.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

5.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

27.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

67.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

54.movie_plot: Luke McNamara, a college senior from a working class background joins a secret elitist college fraternity organization called "The Skulls", in hope of gaining acceptance into Harvard Law ...

24.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

59.movie_plot: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

94.movie_plot: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

65.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

58.movie_plot: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

89.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

86.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

15.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

126.movie_name: Nightmare on Elm Street Part 2: Freddy's Revenge, A (1985)
126.movie_plot: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

17.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

57.movie_plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

109.movie_plot: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover; the demonic cenobites are pursuing him after he escaped their sadomasochistic underworld.

107.movie_plot: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.
